option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
package tech.arcent.auth
/* * Removed ToastUtils implementation. * Fancy toast no longer used after auth simplification. * File kept empty intentionally pending physical deletion if desired. */

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!-- Simplified monochrome Google G for sign-in button (white). --> <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="24dp" android:height="24dp" android:viewportWidth="24" android:viewportHeight="24"> <path android:fillColor="#FFFFFFFF" android:pathData="M12,2c5.52,0 10,4.48 10,10 0,5.52 -4.48,10 -10,10 -5.52,0 -10,-4.48 -10,-10 0,-5.52 4.48,-10 10,-10zm0,2.4c-4.2,0 -7.6,3.4 -7.6,7.6 0,4.2 3.4,7.6 7.6,7.6 3.86,0 6.97,-2.83 7.52,-6.48h-7.52v-2.64h7.48c-0.55,-3.61 -3.64,-6.08 -7.48,-6.08z"/> </vector>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <!-- Solid brand background --> <item android:drawable="@color/arcent_primary" />
<!-- Centered splash logo (vector). Width/height match vector size (108dp). --> <item android:gravity="center" android:width="108dp" android:height="108dp" android:drawable="@drawable/splash_logo" /> </layer-list>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="108dp" android:height="108dp" android:viewportWidth="108" android:viewportHeight="108"> <!-- Round foreground icon: outer transparent (system masks anyway), inner white circle with brand mark --> <!-- White circle (slightly inset to avoid clipping) --> <path android:fillColor="#FFFFFFFF" android:pathData="M54,14 A40,40 0 1 1 53.999,14" /> <!-- Brand mark: smaller circle in brand darker tint --> <path android:fillColor="#6B8C83" android:pathData="M54,34 A20,20 0 1 1 53.999,34" /> <!-- Optional inner cut (hollow center) to give layered feel --> <path android:fillColor="#FFFFFFFF" android:pathData="M54,44 A10,10 0 1 1 53.999,44" /> </vector>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="288dp" android:height="288dp" android:viewportWidth="288" android:viewportHeight="288"> <!-- Simple temporary geometric logo: layered diamond + inner shape --> android:pathData="M144,16 L272,144 144,272 16,144 Z"/> android:pathData="M144,16 L272,144 144,272 16,144 Z"/> android:pathData="M144,16 L272,144 144,272 16,144 Z"/> android:fillColor="#FFFFFFFF" android:fillColor="#799C92" android:pathData="M144,56 L232,144 144,232 56,144 Z"/> android:pathData="M144,56 L232,144 144,232 56,144 Z"/> android:pathData="M144,56 L232,144 144,232 56,144 Z"/>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="108dp" android:height="108dp" android:viewportWidth="108" android:viewportHeight="108">
<!-- Padding (12dp) around shapes to avoid edge clipping in splash mask --> <!-- Outer diamond (white) --> <path android:fillColor="#FFFFFFFF" android:pathData="M54,12 L96,54 54,96 12,54 Z"/>
<!-- Inner diamond (brand color slightly darker for contrast) --> <path android:fillColor="#6B8C83" android:pathData="M54,26 L82,54 54,82 26,54 Z"/>
<!-- Core center mark (white) --> <path android:fillColor="#FFFFFFFF" android:pathData="M54,40 L68,54 54,68 40,54 Z"/> </vector>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <adaptive-icon xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <background android:drawable="@color/arcent_primary" /> <foreground android:drawable="@drawable/splash_icon_foreground" /> <!-- No monochrome provided yet --> </adaptive-icon>
